DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effects of three interventions on CPAP adherence.
DOC.brief_title: Weekly Phone Calls Versus Brief Patient Education to Improve Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) Compliance
DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether there is a need for a more intensive one on one interaction with the patient in order to improve CPAP usage. And also to try to identify in general which population of patients may require a more intensive intervention.
DOC.criteria: All new patients undergoing of the Sleep Center suspected of having sleep apnea and undergoing sleep studies Refusal to participate, or not suspected of having sleep apnea prior to the study
